original: 荊州南陽人，自稱為黃巾軍。擊殺益州刺史郤儉後，復又進軍巴郡、犍為，僭稱為帝，不久即被益州從事賈龍所破。
text: A native of Nanyang, Jingzhou, who calls himself the Yellow Turban Army. After slaying the governor of Yizhou but Jian, he again marched into Ba County and Qianwei. He was called the emperor and was soon defeated by Jia Long, who was engaged in Yizhou.
